HELLO_MESSAGE: Moni, takulandirani ku pulogalamu yathu yabwino!

RESET_SENT: Imelo yokonzanso chinsinsi yatumizidwa! Chonde onani m'bokosi lanu.

LOGIN_VALIDATION_5: Malo a chinsinsi asayenera kukhala opanda kanthu
F_P_1: Mimba yanu imayamba pamene umuna wa mwamuna umalowa mu dzira lanu.
F_P_2: Kumayambiriro kwa sabata ino, mumatulutsa dzira. Dzira lanu limakwatiwa maola 12 mpaka 24 pambuyo pake ngati umuna ulowa. M'masiku otsatira, dzira lokwatiwa (lotchedwa zygote) liyamba kugawikana kukhala maselo ambiri pamene likuyenda mu chubu cha fallopian, kulowa mu chiberekero chanu, ndikuyamba kubisa mu khoma la chiberekero.
F_P_3: Mpira wanu wa maselo tsopano ndi mwana wamng'ono. Tsopano muli pafupifupi masabata 4 kuyambira kumayambiriro kwa masiku anu omaliza.
F_P_4: Tsopano kuyamba kupanga nkhope ndi khosi. Mtima ndi mitsempha ikupitilizabe kukula. Mapapo, mimba ndi chiwindi zikuyambanso kukula.
F_P_5: Ndi pa nthawi iyi - pamene masiku anu otsatira akadali kuyembekezeredwa - kuti mungakwanitse kupeza zotsatira zabwino pa kuyesa kwa mimba kunyumba.
F_P_6: Amayeza pafupifupi 5cm ndipo amayamba kupanga mayendedwe ake. Kugunda kwa mtima kwa mwana kumatha kumveka koma ndi chida chapadera chokha.
F_P_7: Sabata ino zochita za mwana wanu zimayamba: Zala zake ziyamba kutseguka ndi kutseka, zala za miyendo zidzakhotha, ndipo pakamwa pake pipanga mayendedwe oyamwa.
F_P_8: Maso a mwana amatha kupenya ndipo mtima ndi mitsempha yamalizidwa kwathunthu. Mawonekedwe a tsitsi pa mutu wa mwana ayamba, ngakhale tsitsi lake silioneka.
F_P_9: Miyendo yake yakula kwambiri, mutu wake wakhazikika, ndipo makutu ake ali pafupi ndi malo ake omaliza. Zala za manja ndi miyendo za mwana zili ndi zizindikiro za zala. Mwana tsopano amayeza pafupifupi 11-12cm ndipo amalemera pafupifupi 100 grams.
F_P_10: Pamwamba pa chiberekero chanu (mimba) tsopano ndi 7.8cm pansi pa chidodomeki chanu.
F_P_11: Onjezani nyama, nsomba, nyemba kapena mazira ndi phala lanu la chinangwa kapena nthochi kuti mupereke mphamvu kwa mwana wanu.
F_P_12: Onjezani tsiku lililonse zipatso ndi masamba obiriwira, mtedza ndi abwino, chepetsani mchere mu chakudya chanu.
F_P_13: Muyenera kukhala ndi nsinkhu pang'ono tsopano. Ngati nsinkhu ikupitilira, uzani wogwira ntchito ya umoyo ku kliniki ya amayi oyembekezera.
F_P_14: Amayeza pafupifupi 5cm ndipo amayamba kupanga mayendedwe ake. Kugunda kwa mtima kwa mwana kumatha kumveka koma ndi chida chapadera chokha.
F_P_15: Kulemera kwake tsopano ndi 500-600 grams. Amayankha phokoso posuntha kapena mtima wake ukugunda mwachangu. Ngati mukumva mayendedwe onyogodola ali ndi hiccups. Mwana angamve kuti ali wotembenuza mu chiberekero. Amatha kumva nyimbo, mawu anu, kumva mayendedwe anu, kumva manja anu mukamugwira.
F_P_16: Mwana wanu ali ndi mawonekedwe aatali komanso wopyapyala, koma nthawi za kunenepa zikubwera. Khungu lake likadali lopyapyala komanso lowoneka, koma lidzasintha posachedwa.
F_P_17: Mwana ali ndi utali wa 35cm ndipo amalemera kilo imodzi. Amayenda mozungulira ndikumenya kwambiri tsopano. Akusewera ngati kubala kunayamba kale, mwana wanu angakwanitse kukhala ndi moyo koma ndi bwino kuti akhale mkati kwa masabata 10 ena!
F_P_18: Kuwona kwa mwana wanu kukukula, komwe kungamuthandize kuzindikira kuwala komwe kukulowa kuchokera kunja. Amatha kupenya, ndipo nsidze zake zakula.
F_P_19: Funsani dokotala wanu za zizindikiro za kubala kwa nthawi yisanakwane. Unikani dongosolo lanu la kubala ndikudzikongoletsa kubala, phunzirani zizindikiro za mkwiyo ndi chenjezo, ndi momwe kubala kumayambira.
F_P_20: Mwana amalemera pafupifupi 2kg tsopano ndipo akuyenda kwambiri. Ziwonongeko za khungu zikutha pamene mafuta akuyamba kupanga pansi pa khungu. Pakati pa tsopano ndi kubadwa kwake, mwana wanu adzawonjezera pakati pa kilo imodzi mpaka iwiri.
F_P_21: Mwina mukuwonjezera pafupifupi paundi imodzi pa sabata tsopano. Theka la izo limapita kwa mwana wanu, yemwe adzawonjezera theka kapena theka la kulemera kwake pa kubadwa m'masabata asanu ndi awiri otsatira pokonzekera moyo kunja kwa chiberekero.
F_P_22: Ana amasiyana pa kukula, anyamata nthawi zambiri amakhala akuluakulu kuposa atsikana, mapasa amakhala ang'onoang'ono kuposa mmodzi, makolo amakhala akuluakulu kapena ang'onoang'ono.
F_P_23: Ngati mwana wanu ndi wamng'ono koma akukula bwino ndi zabwino. Pa nthawi ino amayeza pafupifupi 47cm ndipo amalemera pafupi ndi 2.7kg. Ubongo ndi mapapo ali pafupifupi kutha.
F_P_24: Mutu ukuyang'ana pansi tsopano, wokonzeka kubala. Kubala pakati pa masabata 37-42 ndi kwabwino.
F_P_25: Nawo! Tsiku la kubala la mwana kuti akule kwathunthu limawerengedwa kwa masabata 40 a mimba, koma kubala kwa nthawi yoyenera kungakhale kuchokera sabata 38 mpaka 42.
F_P_26: Ngati kubala sikunayambe kokha pa masabata 42, kubala kungayambitsidwe ndi dokotala kuti mwana ndi inu mukhale otetezeka.
F_P_27: Ngati mwadutsa tsiku lanu la kubala, mwina simuli mochedwa monga mukuganizira, makamaka ngati munawerengera kutengera tsiku la masiku anu omaliza. Nthawi zina amayi amatulutsa dzira mochedwa kuposa momwe amayembekezera.

YOU_FIRST: Kuyambira pachiyambi, mowa, kusuta ndi mankhwala (kuphatikizapo tiyi wa zitsamba) zingawononge kwambiri thanzi la mwana wanu.
YOU_SECOND: Nchifukwa chake ndikofunikira kudziwa ngati mukuyembekezera mwana ndikufunafuna uphungu ndi chithandizo kuchokera kwa opereka chithandizo cha umoyo oyenerera msanga.
YOU_THIRD: Mwezi umodzi, mawere anu angakhale owawa komanso otupa kale. Mukumva ngati mukusanza kawirikawiri? M'masabata angapo zidzatha
YOU_FOURTH: Kumwa tiyi wopepuka ndikudya zigawo zing'onozing'ono za chakudya pa nthawi, osakhala wamafuta kwambiri, wokoma kapena wa mchere, kudzachepetsa nsinkhu.
YOU_FIFTH: Kwa thanzi la mwana wanu, osamwa mowa, osagwiritsa ntchito tiyi wa zitsamba kapena fodya kapena zinthu za chamba. Dyani chakudya chabwino.
YOU_SIXTH: Kwa thanzi la mwana wanu, osamwa mowa, osagwiritsa ntchito tiyi wa zitsamba kapena fodya kapena zinthu za chamba. Dyani chakudya chabwino.
VAGINAL_BLEEDING: Imvani ambulansi nthawi yomweyo! Kutuluka magazi kwambiri kuchokera ku maliseche kumafuna chithandizo cha dokotala nthawi yomweyo.
BABY_COMING: Mwana wanu akubwera! Imvani ambulansi nthawi yomweyo.
CONTRACTION_DETECTED: Kupindika kwamphamvu kwazindikiridwa. Imvani wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo kapena konzekerani kupita ku chipatala.
BABY_MOVEMENT: Nkhawa za mayendedwe a mwana zazindikiridwa. Imvani wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo nthawi yomweyo ndikukonzekera kupita ku chipatala.
IMPORTANT_1: KOFUNIKIRA: Moyo wanu ndi wa mwana wanu ungadalire kuchitapo kanthu mwachangu!
BLEEDING_1: Ngati mukutuluka magazi kwambiri kuchokera ku maliseche, osadikira - imvani ambulansi koyamba!
BLEEDING_2: Ngati mukutuluka magazi kwambiri kuchokera ku maliseche, osadikira - imvani ambulansi koyamba!
BLEEDING_DESCRIPTION_1: M'masabata oyambirira, kutuluka magazi pang'ono kungakhale kwabwinobwino, koma kutuluka magazi kwambiri nthawi zonse ndi mwadzidzidzi.
VAGINA_QUESTION_1: Kutuluka kwa maliseche konunkhira komanso kwamitundu?
VAGINA_QUESTION_2: Kutayika kwa madzi ochokera ku maliseche?
VAGINA_QUESTION_5: Kutayika kwa madzi ochokera ku maliseche?
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_1: Kutuluka konunkhira, kwachikasu kumasonyeza matenda omwe ayenera kuchizidwa.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_2: Izi zimachokera ku thumba la amniotic lomwe mwana amakhala.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_3: Pewani fumbi ndi utsi. Phimbani pakamwa ndi mphuno ndi nsalu kunja.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_4: Yesani kukumbukira ngati munadya china chake chomwe chinayambitsa kapena munali ndi wina wodwala.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_5: Zizindikiro izi pamodzi zingasonyeze vuto lalikulu.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_6: Pambuyo pa masabata 24, tengani nthawi tsiku lililonse kumva ngati mwana akusuntha. Pambuyo pa sabata 32, bata ladzidzidzi likufuna kuwunikidwa.
VAGINA_DESCRIPTION_7: Uzani munthu wokhulupirika yemwe angakuthandizeni kulowetsa uthenga ngati pakufunika.
HEALTH_QUESTION_8: Kodi mumatopa mwachangu pochita ntchito za tsiku ndi tsiku?
HEALTH_QUESTION_9: Kodi mwakhala mukumva mutu kuwawa kawirikawiri kuyambira pomwe munatenga mimba?
HEALTH_QUESTION_11: Kodi mwakhala ndi kutentha thupi kuyambira pomwe munatenga mimba?
HEALTH_QUESTION_15: Kodi mwapanga dongosolo la kubala ndi mwadzidzidzi?
HEALTH_QUESTION_16: Kodi mukumva kutupa m'miyendo, manja, kapena nkhope?
HEALTH_QUESTION_17: Kodi mukuzindikira kupindika kapena kuuma kwa mimba?
HEALTH_QUESTION_18: Kodi mwakonza chikwama chanu cha chipatala?
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_1: Pamene muli ndi mimba, kutentha thupi kulikonse kuyenera kuwunikidwa kuti kusakwanitse kuwononga mwana wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_2: Ndizabwino kuti mukumva bwino! Pitirizani kuyang'anira kusintha kulikonse.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_3: Chonde yang'anirani zizindikiro zanu mosamala. Ngati vuto lanu likuipiraipira, funafunani chithandizo cha dokotala.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_4: Ngati mukumva osabwino nthawi zonse, chonde funafunani wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_5: Kusautsa komwe kumachokera ku mimba ndi kofala, koma ngati ndi koopsa, ganizirani kukambirana ndi dokotala wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_6: Ndizabwino kumva izi! Ngati muyamba kumva kusautsa, lembani nthawi ndi kawirikawiri.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_7: Ngati kusautsa kukupitilira, kulimbikitsidwa kufunafuna uphungu kuchokera kwa wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_8: Kutopa ndi kofala, koma onetsetsani kuti mukupuma mokwanira. Ngati kukukulirakulira, funafunani dokotala wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_9: Kukhala ndi mphamvu ndi kwabwino! Pitirizani ndondomeko yanu yapano ndikusintha ngati pakufunika.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_10: Ngati kutopa kukupitilira pa mlingo womwewo, ganizirani kusintha ndondomeko yanu kapena kulankhula ndi katswiri wa zamankhwala.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_11: Kusintha kwa mahomoni kungayambitse kusintha kwa maganizo. Ngati zikukhudza ubwino wanu, ganizirani uphungu kapena uphungu wa zamankhwala.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_12: Kusunga maganizo okhazikika ndi kwabwino! Pitirizani kuchita zinthu zomwe zimathandizira ubwino wa maganizo.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_13: Ngati kusintha kwa maganizo kukupitilira, njira zopumitsira kapena kulankhula ndi katswiri zingakuthandizeni.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_14: Zilakolako ndi zonyansa ndi zabwinobwino. Onetsetsani kuti chakudya chanu chikadali cholingana ndikufunafuna dokotala wanu ngati mukuda nkhawa.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_15: Chakudya cholingana ndi chabwino pa nthawi ya mimba. Pitirizani kuyang'ana pa zakudya.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_16: Ngati zilakolako zanu kapena zonyansa zikadali zomwezo, pitirizani kuzitsata ndikuonetsetsa kuti mukudya moukonde.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_17: Nsinkhu za m'mawa ndi zofala pa nthawi ya mimba, koma ngati ndi zoopsa kapena zokhazikika, funafunani wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_18: Ndizabwino kuti simukumva nsinkhu. Pitirizani kuyang'anira kusintha kulikonse.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_19: Ngati nsinkhu ikupitilira, yesani chakudya chochepa, kawirikawiri ndikufunafuna dokotala wanu ngati pakufunika.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_20: Tulo labwino ndilofunikira. Pitirizani kusunga ndondomeko yabwino ya tulo.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_21: Yesani kukonza malo anu ogonera ndi ndondomeko. Ngati kusowa tulo kukupitilira, lankhulani ndi wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_22: Ngati mavuto a tulo akupitilira, ganizirani kusintha ndondomeko yanu kapena kufunafuna uphungu wa zamankhwala.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_23: Kupsinjika maganizo ndi nkhawa ndi zofala koma ziyenera kuyang'aniridwa. Ganizirani njira zopumitsira kapena kulankhula ndi wochiza maganizo.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_24: Kusunga maganizo abata ndi kwabwino! Pitirizani kugwiritsa ntchito njira zochotsera kupsinjika maganizo.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_25: Ngati kupsinjika maganizo kapena nkhawa zikupitilira, ganizirani kukambirana njira zothetsera ndi katswiri.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_26: Mayendedwe a mwana nthawi zonse ndi chizindikiro chabwino. Pitirizani kuyang'anira ndikuzindikira kusintha kulikonse.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_27: Kusowa mayendedwe kungakhale kodandaula. Chonde imvani wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu nthawi yomweyo.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_28: Ngati mukupitiliza kuzindikira mayendedwe ochepa, ndikofunikira kufunafuna uphungu wa zamankhwala.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_29: Ndikofunikira kuthana ndi nkhawa zilizonse ndi wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu. Kuchitapo kanthu msanga ndikofunikira.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_30: Ndizabwino kuti mukumva bwino ndi momwe mimba yanu ikuyendera. Pitirizani kuyang'anira momwe mukumvera.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_31: Ngati mukupitiliza kukhala ndi nkhawa zomwezo, musachite mantha kukambirana ndi katswiri wa umoyo.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_32: Kuyambira pachiyambi, mowa, kusuta ndi mankhwala (kuphatikizapo tiyi wa zitsamba) zingawononge kwambiri thanzi la mwana wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_33: Nchifukwa chake ndikofunikira kudziwa ngati mukuyembekezera mwana ndikufunafuna uphungu ndi chithandizo kuchokera kwa opereka chithandizo cha umoyo oyenerera msanga.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_34: Mwezi umodzi, mawere anu angakhale owawa komanso otupa kale. Mukumva ngati mukusanza kawirikawiri? M'masabata angapo zidzatha
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_35: Kumwa tiyi wopepuka ndikudya zigawo zing'onozing'ono za chakudya pa nthawi, osakhala wamafuta kwambiri, wokoma kapena wa mchere, kudzachepetsa nsinkhu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_36: Kwa thanzi la mwana wanu, osamwa mowa, osagwiritsa ntchito tiyi wa zitsamba kapena fodya kapena zinthu za chamba. Dyani chakudya chabwino.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_37: Pa masabata 8-11, palibe chooneka koma mungamve kutopa komanso nsinkhu kawirikawiri makamaka m'mawa. Zidzatha m'masabata angapo
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_38: Kumwa tiyi wopepuka ndikudya zigawo zing'onozing'ono popanda mafuta komanso mchere wambiri kumathandiza
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_39: Ngati mukumva nsinkhu kawirikawiri pambuyo pa masabata 12, uzani wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu. Funsani mwamuna wanu kuti abwere. Ayeneranso kuyesedwa matenda.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_40: Munaphonya masiku anu kawiri? Mukumva nsinkhu ndipo mawere anu akumva kulemera pang'ono.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_41: Mwina mwazindikira, ena ochepa adzazindikira, koma ndizabwino kupita ku kliniki ya ANC tsopano kuti muyambe bwino mimba yanu ndi kuyesa matenda owopsa, uphungu ndi zowonjezera za vitamini.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_42: Ndipo, ngati pakufunika mankhwala, kuti mukhale otetezeka komanso athanzi inu ndi mwana wanu. Funsani mwamuna wanu kuti abwere nawo.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_43: Onjezani nyama, nsomba, nyemba kapena mazira ndi phala lanu la chinangwa kapena nthochi kuti mupereke mphamvu kwa mwana wanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_44: Onjezani tsiku lililonse zipatso ndi masamba obiriwira, mtedza ndi abwino, chepetsani mchere mu chakudya chanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_45: Muyenera kukhala ndi nsinkhu pang'ono tsopano. Ngati nsinkhu ikupitilira, uzani wogwira ntchito ya umoyo ku kliniki ya amayi oyembekezera
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_46: Pa sabata 20-23, muyenera kuyamba kumva mwana akumenya ndikusuntha ngati mukugona chete.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_47: Masabata 18-20 asanakwane kuti mwana abadwe, koma china chake chingachitike chomwe chingamupangitse kuyesa kubwera msanga, choncho konzekerani
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_48: Pa ulendo wanu wotsatira wa prenatal, pitani ndi mwamuna wanu kapena munthu wokhulupirika ndikukambirana dongosolo lanu la kubala ndi mwadzidzidzi ndi othandizira ku kliniki
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_49: Amayi awa ali ndi mimba ya masabata 24 (miyezi 7). Akuwala ndi thanzi. Akudya chakudya chabwino, amachita masewera olimbitsa thupi, amapuma pang'ono koma osambiri.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_50: Tsopano mwana ayamba kukula mwachangu, choncho dyani mapuloteni ambiri (nsomba, mazira, nyama, mkaka ndi masamba obiriwira ndi ndiwo zonse ndi zipatso za nyengo). Samalani, mwana wanu angadzilengeze msanga.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_51: Miyezi itatu kapena yochepa isanabadwe kodi dongosolo lanu la kubala lili lokonzeka?
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_52: Mimba yanu iyenera kukula mwachangu tsopano ndipo mawere anu akukula ndikukhala owawa pokonzekera kuyamwitsa
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_53: Gonani masana. Khalani otanganidwa koma osanyamula katundu wolemera kapena kulima
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_54: Mimba yanu ndi yayikulu tsopano ndipo idzakukulabe kwambiri pamene mwana wanu awonjezera 1 mpaka 2 kg
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_55: Madzi achikasu angayambe kutuluka m'mawere anu. Amatchedwa colostrum, ndipo zimachitika kuti zikonze mawere anu kupanga mkaka
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_56: Ngati ndi kotheka pitani ku kliniki ya ANC masabata awiri aliwonse pa gawo ili la mimba ngati simungathe kupita, lumikizanani ndi wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu kudzera mu JamboMama
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_57: Mimba yanu tsopano ili pafupifupi masabata 36: kubala kwayandikira! Dongosolo la kubala lili lokonzeka? Munthu wokhulupirika ali wokonzeka? Zonse zili zokonzeka? Pitani ku dongosolo lanu la kubala kamodzi!
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_58: Uphungu: Pamene mukukhala olemera ndizabwino kugona mbali ya kumanzere kuti mpweya ndi magazi azipitilira kupita kwa mwana wanu
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_60: Ngati mwana wanu sakadali, khalani okonzeka kupita ku chipatala nthawi iliyonse. Onetsetsani kuti mwana wanu akupitiliza kusuntha ndikugona ndi kupuma mbali ya kumanzere. Ngati zadutsa masabata 40 ndipo palibe chochitika, imvani RHP yanu.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_61: Miyezi itatu kapena yochepa isanabadwe kodi dongosolo lanu la kubala lili lokonzeka?
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_62: Muyenera kuyang'aniridwa mosamala. Ngati kubala sikunayambe kokha pa sabata 42, kupindika (zowawa za kubala) kungayambitsidwe.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_63: Mwana wanu wabadwa! Zikomo! Munapita ku chipatala pa nthawi yoyenera.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_64: Pumani bwino, yamwitsani mwana wanu ndikukhala olumikizana ndi wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu! Masiku khumi oyamba akadali pachiopsezo chachikulu. Yang'anirani zizindikiro za ngozi izi za inu. Kutentha thupi, kutuluka magazi, kapena kutuluka konunkhira kuchokera ku maliseche, kugwedezeka.
HEALTH_DESCRIPTION_65: Mwa mwana wanu: kutentha thupi, kugwedezeka, kuvutika kupuma, kusasuntha, kuyamwa mosasamala. Imvani chithandizo cha mwadzidzidzi kwa mwana wanu nthawi yomweyo pamene mukuda nkhawa za chilichonse!
ANY_OTHER_QUESTION_1: Fotokozani nkhawa zina zomwe muli nazo...
THANK_YOU_1: Zikomo amayi! RHP yanu idzawerenga izi ndikukulumikizanani ngati pakufunika. Ngati zizindikiro zikuipiraipira, imvani wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu kapena chipatala chapafupi. Fomu lachotsedwa kuti mugwiritse ntchito kotsatira
LOADING_USER_DATA: Chonde dikirani, kutsegula deta ya wogwiritsa ntchito...
LEARN: P h u n z i r a n i
ASSESSMENT_FAILED: Kulephera kusunga kuwunika. Chonde onani kulumikizana kwanu ndikuyesanso. Mayankho anu asungidwa.
ASSESSMENT_NOT_FOUND: Palibe kuwunika kwa mwadzidzidzi komwe kwapezeka kwa wodwala uyu.
ERROR_5: Palibe chipatala cha umoyo chomwe chilipo.
ERROR_9: Palibe deta ya wogwiritsa ntchito yomwe yapezeka
ERROR_12: Palibe mayankho ochokera kwa wodwala uyu
ERROR_14: Cholakwika pakutsegula deta ya wogwiritsa ntchito
ERROR_17: Mulibe wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wolumikizidwa kuti mulankhule nawo
APPLICATION_SENT: Pempho lanu latumizidwa ku portal yathu ya oyang'anira. Tidzakubwererani posachedwa.
NO_HEALTH_FACILITIES: Palibe chipatala cha umoyo chomwe chilipo.
CRITICAL_VAGINA: KOOPSA: Kutuluka magazi kwambiri kwa maliseche kwanenedwa
URGENT_VAGINA: MWADZIDZIDZI: Wodwala akunena kuti mwana waleka kusuntha
_comment: Gawo ili likuyang'anira zosintha za wogwiritsa ntchito
NAME_OF_CHOSEN_HEALTH_FACILITY: Dzina la chipatala cha umoyo chosankhidwa
NAME: Dzina
HOW_LONG_TRIP: Ulendo umenewu umatenga nthawi yayitali bwanji?
STAY_AFTER_BIRTH: Kodi adzakhala nanu mpaka pambuyo pa kubala?
WHAT_BLOOD_GROUP: Kodi gulu lake la magazi ndi lanji?
W_H_P: Wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo uti amene adzathandize pa kubala?
NAME_CONTACT_TAXI: Dzina ndi zambiri za oyendetsa taxi kapena munthu wokhulupirika:
SAVE_TFARE: Ngati muyenera kulipira mayendedwe, yambani kusunga tsopano!
PLANNING_VISIT_HEALTH_F: Mukukonzekera liti kuyendera chipatala cha umoyo?
BRING_HEALTH_FACILITY: Zinthu zobwera nazo ku chipatala cha umoyo:
SESSION_HC: Gawo lanu ndi wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo latha chifukwa cha zifukwa za chitetezo.
V_HEALTH_CARE: Chonde tsimikizirani kukhalapo kwa wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo kuti mupitilize.
IMPORTANT_M_I: Fomu ili lili ndi zidziwitso zofunikira za zamankhwala zomwe ziyenera kudzazidwa ndi chithandizo cha dokotala woyenerera.
HEALTHCARE_PROVIDER: Chonde khalani ndi wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu kuti atsimikizire ndikuthandiza ndi fomu ili.
ASK_VERIFICATION_CODE: Chonde funsani wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu kuti alowetse kodi yake yotsimikizira:
VERIFIED_PRESENT: Wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wotsimikiziridwa ayenera kukhalapo kuti atumize fomu ili.
V_PROVIDER: Chonde tsimikizirani wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo kuti mumalize fomu ili
P_E_DOB: Chonde lowetsani tsiku lanu la kubadwa
P_E_PH: Chonde lowetsani nambala ya foni ya wodwala
P_E_EC: Chonde lowetsani kulumikizana kwanu kwa mwadzidzidzi
P_S_BT: Chonde sankhani mtundu wanu wa magazi
N_V_I: Palibe zidziwitso zofunikira zomwe zilipo kwa wodwala uyu
YOUR_OVER_ALL_WELL: Ubwino wanu wonse ndiwofunikira kwa inu ndi mwana wanu.
S_O_B_N: Kuvutika kupuma kungakhale kwabwinobwino pa nthawi ya mimba koma kuyenera kuyang'aniridwa.
F_D_P_E: Mutu kuwawa kawirikawiri pa nthawi ya mimba kuyenera kuwunikidwa.
C_H_S_U: Mkhalidwe wa mutu kuwawa wapano umathandiza kudziwa kofunikira.
F_DP_B: Kutentha thupi pa nthawi ya mimba kumafuna chidwi cha zamankhwala kuti muteteze mwana wanu.
M_SICKNESS_C: Nsinkhu za m'mawa ndi zofala kumayambiriro kwa mimba koma zingachitike nthawi iliyonse.
G_B_H: Tulo labwino ndilofunikira kwa thanzi lanu ndi kukula kwa mwana wanu.
B_M_G: Mayendedwe a mwana ndi chizindikiro chabwino cha thanzi la mwana wanu.
P_AHEAD: Kukonzekera msanga kumathandiza kuonetsetsa kubala kotetezeka kwa inu ndi mwana wanu.
SWELLING_NORMAL: Kutupa kungakhale kwabwinobwino koma kungasonyeze zovuta monga pre-eclampsia.
C_37: Kupindika kusanakwane masabata 37 kungasonyeze kubala kwa nthawi yisanakwane.
B_P_DE: Kukonzekera kubala kumathandiza kuchepetsa kupsinjika maganizo pamene kubala kuyamba.
A_O_Q: Funso lina lililonse kapena nkhawa yomwe muli nayo?
F_F_C_H: Khalani omasuka kugawana nkhawa zilizonse - wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu ali pano kukuthandizani.
T_M_I: Zikomo amayi! Wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu adzawerenga zidziwitso izi ndikukulumikizanani ngati pakufunika.
P_C_H: Chonde lumikizanani ndi wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu.
D_P_NEXT: Kambiranani izi ndi wopereka chithandizo wanu pa ulendo wanu wotsatira.
M_CHW_P: Nenani kwa CHW wanu kapena wopereka chithandizo.
C_Y_P_M: Lumikizanani ndi wopereka chithandizo wanu tsopano.
M_T_V: Nenani izi pa ulendo wanu wotsatira.
C_H_P: Lumikizanani ndi wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu.
A_S_T: Funsani wina kuti awone kutentha kwanu.
IT_WILL_PASS: Zidzatha. Funsani uphungu kwa CHW wanu.
P_C_P: Chonde lumikizanani ndi wopereka chithandizo wanu.
ASK_CHW: Funsani CHW wanu kapena onani gawo la Kutsatira mimba.
START_N_B_P_S: Yambani tsopano! Pitani ku gawo la Dongosolo la kubala.
C_CHW_S: Lumikizanani ndi CHW wanu kuti awone zizindikiro za pre-eclampsia.
T_T_F_P: Tsatirani kawirikawiri. Ngati ndi kokhazikika, lumikizanani ndi wopereka chithandizo wanu.
P_P_H_B: Chonde konzani chikwama chanu cha chipatala sabata ino.
THIS_LEVEL_OBESE: Mlingo uwu wa BMI ukusonyeza kunenepa

HEALTH_ISSUE_2: Mlingo uwu ukusonyeza kuthamanga kwa magazi gawo 2: kumafuna kuyang'aniridwa ndi chithandizo
HEALTH_ISSUE_3: Mlingo uwu ukusonyeza mwadzidzidzi wa kuthamanga kwa magazi: chithandizo cha zamankhwala chikufunika nthawi yomweyo
HEALTH_ISSUE_12: Mlingo uwu ukusonyeza matenda a shuga a mimba. RHP yanu idzakuphunzitsani

HEALTH_ISSUE_15: Mimba yoyamba ndi chiopsezo cha zaka

G_Q_14: Kodi inu ndi mwamuna wanu mwayesedwa matenda a syphilis?
G_Q_19: Kodi mwakhala pa chithandizo cha TB?
G_Q_22: Kodi muli pa chithandizo cha TB tsopano?

G_Q_28: Munagwiritsa ntchito mankhwala a malaria liti posachedwa?
G_Q_33: Munamwa mankhwala a nyongolotsi liti komaliza?
G_Q_39: Matenda a shuga, Kuthamanga kwa magazi, Matenda a mtima, ndi zina

G_Q_43: Munali ndi kufa kwa mimba kangati kale?

G_Q_63: Zidziwitso za wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo:
G_Q_65: • Deta yosakwanira sidzaletsa kusunga zidziwitso zanu
G_Q_66: • Inu ndi wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu mutha kuwona zomwe zikusowa kuti muzikwaniritse pambuyo pake
G_Q_67: • Zidziwitso izi zimathandiza kuyang'anira momwe mimba yanu ikuyendera
G_Q_68: • Lumikizanani ndi wopereka chithandizo cha umoyo wanu ngati muli ndi mafunso

ARE_YOU_THERAPY: Kodi muli pa chithandizo cha Antiretroviral (ART)?

P_E_M: Chonde malo a imelo ndi opanda kanthu
P_FF_E: Chonde malo a dzina lonse ndi opanda kanthu
P_S_DOB: Chonde sankhani tsiku lanu la kubadwa
P_E_6_H: Chinsinsi chiyenera kukhala ndi zilembo 6 osachepera
N_P_8: Zinsinsi za manambala ziyenera kukhala ndi manambala 8 osachepera
P_S_C_U: Chinsinsi chiyenera kukhala ndi zilembo zazikulu, zazing'ono ndi manambala

HQ_9: Kodi mukumva mayendedwe a mwana nthawi zonse?

PESI: Imelo yokonzanso chinsinsi yatumizidwa! Onani m'bokosi lanu.
PERP: Perekani imelo yanu ndipo tidzakutumizireni ulalo wokonzanso chinsinsi chanu
N_USER_F: Palibe wogwiritsa ntchito yemwe wapezeka pa imelo ija.
AEC: Akaunti ilipo kale pa imelo ija.
D_ACCOUNT: Akaunti ya wogwiritsa ntchito uyu yaletetsedwa.
L_C_C: Kupindika kopepuka kusanakwane sabata 37 kungatha kuima kokha. Kupindika kwamphamvu kungasonyeze kubala kapena zovuta.
R_W_G_1: Kulemera mwachangu musanalephere masabata 28: itanani dokotala wanu (RHP)
R_W_G_2: Kulemera kuyenera kukhala 2-4 kg pakati pa masabata 19-28
R_W_G_3: Kulemera kuyenera kukhala 3-5 kg pakati pa masabata 29-40
R_W_G_5: \nBMI 18.5-24.9: Kulemera kwathunthu kwa 11.5-16 kg ndi koyenera
R_W_G_7: \nBMI ≥30: Kulemera kuyenera kukhala kochepa momwe zingathekere
R_W_G_8: Muli ndi matenda a kuchepa m'badwo. Pemphani mankhwala a chitsulo kwa dokotala wanu tsopano.
R_W_G_9: Kuchepa kwa chitsulo: Pemphani mankhwala a chitsulo kwa dokotala wanu pamene mukabweranso
R_W_G_10: Lumikizanani ndi dokotala wanu kuti achepetse
R_W_G_13: WAKWELETSA: Pumirani, chepetsani mchere, neneni kwa dokotala wanu
R_W_G_14: Ntchito ya mkati mwake gawo 1: Chenjezo, pitani kwa dokotala wanu
R_W_G_15: Ntchito ya mkati mwake gawo 2: Itanani oteteza akumidzi
R_W_G_16: Ngozi ya mkati mwake: Itanani oteteza akumidzi mwamsanga
R_W_G_19: Sukiri ya pamene mwakhala ndi pamwamba - Dokotala wanu adzadziwitsidwa
NHCAC: Mukufuna thandizo? Lumikizanani ndi dokotala wanu kapena chipatala cha amayi
